summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 49th Avenue Southwest, from West Dawson Street to West Edmunds Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains with the necessary appurtenances; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7944 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
